query.description:
Enter at least 2 characters to search
Required: true
Ex: New York

languageCode.description:
Language
languageCode can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->code)
Ex:  en-us
Default value: en-us

countryFlag.description:
Country
countryFlag can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->countryFlag)
Ex: us
Default value: us

pickUpId.description:
Pick-up location
Required: true
pickUpId can be retrieved from /car/auto-complete endpoint(data->id)
Ex: eyJsYXRpdHVkZSI6IjQwLjc1OTU5IiwibG9uZ2l0dWRlIjoiLTczLjk4NDkxIn0=

pickUpDate.description:
Pick-up date
Required: true
Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Ex: 2024-01-25

pickUpTime.description:
Pick-up time
Required: true
Format: HH:MM
Ex: 10:00

dropOffDate.description:
Drop-off date
Required: true
Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Ex: 2024-01-26

dropOffTime.description:
Drop-off time
Required: true
Format: HH:MM
Ex: 10:00

dropOffId.description:
Drop-off location
droOffId can be retrieved from /car/auto-complete endpoint(data->id)
Ex: eyJsYXRpdHVkZSI6IjQwLjc1OTU5IiwibG9uZ2l0dWRlIjoiLTczLjk4NDkxIn0=

sortBy.description:
Sort by
sortBy can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->sort->identifier)
Ex: recommended
Default value: recommended

recommended: Recommended – best first
price_low_to_high: Price - lowest first

carType.description:
Car Type
carType can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->filter(id=carCategory)->categories->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: carCategory::carriers,carCategory::suvs
Default value: recommended

carCategory::small: Small
carCategory::medium: Medium
carCategory::large: Large
carCategory::premium: Premium
carCategory::carriers: People carriers
carCategory::suvs: SUVs

supplier.description:
Supplier
carType can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->filter(id=supplier)->categories->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: supplier::Alamo,supplier::Enterprise

transmission.description:
Transmission
transmission can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->filter(id=transmission)->categories->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: transmission::AUTOMATIC

units.description:
Units
Ex: metric
Default value: metric
Choose one of the values below
metric: Metric (km, m2)
imperial: Imperial (miles, ft2)

languageCode.description:
Language
languageCode can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->code)
Ex: en-us
Default value: en-us

currencyCode.description:
Currency
currencyCode can be retrieved from /currencies endpoint(data->code)
Ex: USD
Default value: HOTEL(Property's Currency)

countryFlag.description:
Country
countryFlag can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->countryFlag)
Ex: us
Default value: us

pickUpCoord.description:
Pick-up coordinates
Required: true
pickUpCoord can be retrieved from /car/auto-complete endpoint(data->coordinates)
Format: latitude,longitude
Ex: 40.768074,-73.981895

pickUpDate.description:
Pick-up date
Required: true
Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Ex: 2024-01-25

pickUpTime.description:
Pick-up time
Required: true
Format: HH:MM
Ex: 10:00

dropOffDate.description:
Drop-off date
Required: true
Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Ex: 2024-01-26

dropOffTime.description:
Drop-off time
Required: true
Format: HH:MM
Ex: 10:00

dropOffCoord.description:
Drop-off coordinates
dropOffCoord can be retrieved from /car/auto-complete endpoint(data->coordinates)
Format: latitude,longitude
Ex: 40.768074,-73.981895

sortBy.description:
Sort by
sortBy can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->sort->identifier)
Ex: recommended
Default value: recommended

recommended: Recommended – best first
price_low_to_high: Price - lowest first

Car Type
carType can be retrieved from this endpoint(data->filter(id=carCategory)->categories->id)
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
Ex: carCategory::carriers,carCategory::suvs
Default value: recommended

functions.name: Location_to_Lat_Long
functions.func_description: Get location/address latitude and longitude.

query.description: Names of locations, apartment, address, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

functions.name: Search_Hotel_Destination
functions.func_description: Find Hotels by their location, address, state, country, etc. This api's response contains the latitude and longitude for the search query.

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

functions.name: Get_Filter
functions.func_description: Get the `categories_filter` parameter value for `Search_Hotels` function.

dest_id.description: dest_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

search_type.description: search_type can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in hotel collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

categories_filter.description:
categories_filter can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getFilter(Get Filter) endpoint in Hotels collection.
Note: For the initial request, leave it blank.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

functions.name: Get_Sort_By
functions.func_description: Get sorted hotel listings based on filters and destination.

dest_id.description: dest_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

search_type.description: search_type can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

categories_filter.description: categories_filter can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getFilter(Get Filter) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

functions.name: Search_Hotels
functions.func_description: Search Hotels.

dest_id.description: dest_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

search_type.description: search_type can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchDestination(Search Hotel Destination) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

sort_by.description: sort_by can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getSortBy(Get Sort By) endpoint in Hotels collection.

categories_filter.description: categories_filter can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/getFilter(Get Filter) endpoint in Hotels collection.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

functions.name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates
functions.func_description: Search for hotels around a given geographical coordinates.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

radius.description:
The hotels that are within the radius. The radius is measured in kilometers.
Default is set to 100.
Range is between 10 to 500.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

functions.name: Get_Hotel_Photos
functions.func_description: Retrieves a collection of photos for a specified hotel. This enables users to visually explore the property before booking.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

functions.name: Get_Hotel_Facilities
functions.func_description: Retrieves a list of facilities and services (e.g., pool, gym, Wi-Fi) offered by a specified hotel, with optional filtering by date and language.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

functions.name: Search_Flight_Location
functions.func_description: Find airports by their location, address, state, country, etc.

query.description: Names of airport, locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

functions.name: Search_Flights
functions.func_description: Search Flights.

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

stops.description:
Filters flights based on the number of stops. Accepted values are:
none for no preference (returns flights with any number of stops)
0 for non-stop flights
1 for one-stop flights
2 for two-stop flights
If provided, the value must be either none, 0, 1, or 2.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

functions.name: Search_Flights_Multi_Stops
functions.func_description: Search multi-stop Flights.

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{
'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
'date': '2024-05-25'
},
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

functions.name: Get_Flight_Details
functions.func_description: Search the detail information of flights, include: baggage allowances, airline meals, ticket price breakdown (taxes, discounts, baseFare) and insurance prices, etc.

token.description: token can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchFlights(Search Flights) or api/v1/flights/searchFlightsMultiStops(Search Flights Multi Stops) endpoints in Flights collection as token.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

functions.name: Get_Min_Price
functions.func_description: Get the minimum price for flights. This API will return the lowest priced flights within 5 days before and after the query date.

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

functions.name: Get_Min_Price_Multi_Stops
functions.func_description: Get the minimum price for multi-stop flights. This API will return the lowest priced flights within 5 days before and after the query date.

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{
'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
'date': '2024-05-25'
},
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

functions.func_description: Get the seat map for a specific flight.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

functions.name: Search_Attractions
functions.func_description: Search Attraction by trending/attr_book_score/lowest_price.

id.description: id can be retrieved from api/v1/attraction/searchLocation(Search Attraction Location) endpoint in Attraction collection as id inside products or destinations.

startDate.description: Sort the data by the start date.

endDate.description: Sort the data by the end date.

sortBy.description: This parameter orders result by trending, attr_book_score or lowest_price.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

typeFilters.description:
typeFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> typeFilters[]-> tagname.
Note:- typeFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values.
Example: tag1,tag2,tag

priceFilters.description:
priceFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> priceFilters[]-> tagname.
Note:- priceFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values.
Example: tag1,tag2,tag

ufiFilters.description:
ufiFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> ufiFilters[]-> tagname.
Note:- ufiFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values.
Example: tag1,tag2,tag

labelFilters.description:
labelFilters can be retrieved from /api/v1/attraction/searchAttractions(Search Attractions) endpoint in Hotels collection. data->filterOptions-> labelFilters[]-> tagname.
Note:- labelFilters should be separated by commas if passing multiple values.
Example: tag1,tag2,tag
